description: Numbers n such that base 9 representation has exactly 2 runs.
maple: rlen := proc(n,ba) local rs,s,dgs,i ; rs :=0 ; s := 0; dgs := convert(n,base,ba) ; for i from 1 to nops(dgs) do if s = 0 then s :=1 ; else if op(i,dgs) <> op(i-1,dgs) then rs := rs+1 ; s :=1 ; else s :=s+1 ; fi; fi; od: rs := rs+1 ; RETURN (rs) ; end: for n from 1 to 200 do if rlen(n,9) = 2 then printf("%d,",n) ; fi; od: # _R. J. Mathar_, Oct 20 2008
author: _Clark Kimberling_
